description: Bangor progress to the Irish Cup sixth round with a 2-1 extra-time victory over Newington on Saturday.
title: Watch: Bangor edge past Newington to make sixth round
title_page: Irish Cup: Watch: Bangor edge past Newington to make sixth round - BBC Sport
